倚.definition: to lean on; to rely upon

倚仗.definition: to lean on; to rely on

倚天屠龍記.definition: Heaven Sword and Dragon Saber, wuxia (武俠|武侠[wu3 xia2], martial arts chivalry) novel by Jin Yong 金庸[Jin1 Yong1] and its screen adaptations

倚欄望月.definition: to lean against the railings and look at the moon (idiom)

倚老賣老.definition: (idiom) to flaunt one's seniority; to rely on one's age or length of experience to control or belittle others

倚賴.definition: to rely on; to be dependent on

倚靠.definition: to lean on; to rest against; to rely on; support; backing; back of a chair
